about_the_game:
In Bots N-BLOOM you step into the capable shoes of Soriya, an adventurous archeologist searching for a way to help her people in the aftermath of an apocalypse. Battle your way through a unique, solarcore turn-based dungeon crawler, and help the quirky townsfolk you meet with over an hour of content.  Along the way, discover and solve the mystery of the N-BLOOM ruin with the help of a loyal and brave Bloombot, P-K4R!

Discover the Past

Over 400 years since the fall from the climate disaster, society is ready to rebuild.  With the support of her whole small town, archeologist Soriya Chey is on the hunt for the answers to what civilization was once like before the flooding and destruction.  After years of research into the mysterious past and the “Bloombots” of the “Era of Lights” just before the fall, Soriya has finally pinpointed the location of the N-BLOOM ruin!  Her research says it should have something to do with the Bloombots and should reveal more about the distant past.

What could be inside the N-BLOOM?  Active defense mode Bloombots!  Luckily, one active little bot, P-K4R, is ready to assist you through the crumbling structure.  P-K4R’s memory is corrupted, but they say there is something at the base…“The One.”  Perhaps getting to the root of this ruin is the key to revitalizing the town and perhaps even the world.     

Crawl Through a Dangerous Dungeon

Battle your way through a dungeon, one square at a time. Taking inspiration from mystery dungeons, when you move, so do your enemies! Each action costs energy, and when that’s gone you begin losing health. You must carefully consider your actions and be prepared to survive to the bottom of the dungeon. 

Fear not! You are not alone; your helpful buddy, P-K4R, will be there to help you along the way. If you fall, PK will drag you back to town to try again. Upgrade yourself and PK to increase your chances of survival.

Meet a Colorful Cast of Characters

Returning to the safety of the town, Soriya and PK will meet a colorful cast of characters.  The townsfolk even have quests for Soriya to help them and perhaps her newfound knowledge of the N-BLOOM can help her solve the problems of her friends!  Help them and they will help you in return, making the world a better place for everyone.
